## Data

```{r}
#| echo: false
library(DT)

# Load market share data
market_url <- "https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/jhelvy/vehicletrends@main/data/p_market_powertrain_vehicle_type.csv"
market_data <- read.csv(market_url)

# Display data table
datatable(
  market_data,
  options = list(
    pageLength = 10,
    scrollX = TRUE,
    dom = 'Bfrtip',
    buttons = c('copy', 'csv', 'excel')
  ),
  caption = "Market Share of Listings by Powertrain and Vehicle Type (2018 vs 2024)"
)
```

:::
